# discord_role (Data Source)

Use this data source to look up a Discord role by ID or name within a guild.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

locals {
  guild_id = "123456789012345678" # Replace with your guild ID
}

# Look up a role by ID
data "discord_role" "by_id" {
  guild_id = local.guild_id
  id       = "987654321098765432" # Replace with your role ID
}

# Look up a role by name
data "discord_role" "by_name" {
  guild_id = local.guild_id
  name     = "Moderator"
}

output "role_permissions" {
  value = data.discord_role.by_name.permissions
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `guild_id` (String) The ID of the guild to look up the role in.

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the role. At least one of id or name must be provided.
- `name` (String) The name of the role. At least one of id or name must be provided.

### Read-Only

- `color` (Number) The integer representation of the role color.
- `hoist` (Boolean) Whether this role is hoisted (displayed separately in the sidebar).
- `managed` (Boolean) Whether this role is managed by an integration.
- `mentionable` (Boolean) Whether this role is mentionable.
- `permissions` (String) The permission bit set for this role.
- `position` (Number) The position of this role.
